description:
Hozuki conducts interviews while dealing with a fraud and all the newcomers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enma Chou no Hibi / Ichi Shiru San Sai Juu Niku
Les nouvelles recrues / Un repas très complet
The Day-to-Day at the Offices of Enma / 1 Soup, 3 Dishes, 10 Meats
